story-context.story-summary: Story 7-2 adds Agent-to-Agent (A2A) collaboration APIs. The backend will manage in-memory collaboration sessions and expose endpoints for creating sessions, posting messages, and retrieving transcripts. Tenant isolation and rate limiting must mirror existing API patterns.
